duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver, uncrate, assemble, and set up commercial kitchen equipment for customers as scheduled.
Unload trucks and safely move product to limit damage.
Set commercial kitchen equipment in place for connection to be made by contractor.
Assemble and install large commercial kitchen units and equipment including dish machines and refrigeration units.
Read work orders, load tools and equipment, and secure items in the truck.
Inspect installations with the contractor and customer.
Ensure all work documentation is fully and accurately completed, including taking pictures of job sites and progress.
Communicate with Project Manager on job progress and submit daily paperwork.
Track expenses incurred during the course of a job project according to company procedures.
Attend required safety and product training and adhere to all company safety standards and protocols.

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma/GED, or equivalent Military or practical experience. Certification from any trade school is a plus.
